name: The UnEarth Initiative - A Quirky Space Colonization Sim
blurb: Help outcasts colonize an alien planet in this comic sci-fi sim game by veteran developers.

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER - We'll immortalize your name on our website as part of a list of all backers who made UnEarth possible. We'll also give you regular updates on the development process through Kickstarter.
EARLY BIRD BACKER- All the rewards of the Backer tier, for only $15.

BACKER- In return for your support, you'll receive a digital download of UnEarth (for PC or Mac, or any other platforms we have agreed to support) on the day it launches, and special thanks in the credits of the game.
MUSIC LOVER \u2013 All rewards described in the Backer tier, plus a digital download of the soundtrack of the game.

BETA BACKER- By pledging this amount, you'll have all previous rewards offered, plus free access to beta versions of the game, updated regularly until we launch. Help us balance the game by playing and breaking it! In addition you have a chance to have your creativity in the Beta rewarded by having your colony be selected as one of 10 from the Beta to be shipped with the game as an archaeological site. And as an extra reward for your bug finding efforts, you\u2019ll receive the in-game blueprints for the Exterminex 3000, a specialized weapon that is especially effective for eliminating insects.

ALPHA BACKER - With this pledge, you'll be thanked profusely in the game's credits, and also receive free access to Alpha builds of the game. Play the game in its infancy, tell us about your experience, and help shape the game before the Beta even begins. And lastly (and most importantly!) a Space Dog will accompany your colonists on their crash landing! Naturally, you'll receive all earlier rewards, too.

60 - ART AFFICIONADO \u2013 Backers who pledge this will receive all rewards described in the Alpha Backer tier, plus a digital art pack consisting of a PDF copy of an art book of the game, plus several images suitable as wallpaper for your desktop, or as printable posters to hang in every room of your house. And we do mean every room. Your colonists will also receive 3 pieces of in-game art to decorate their rooms with (not available at launch).

COLLECTOR \u2013 This tier receives all the rewards in the earlier tiers, plus a special Collector\u2019s Game Object pack consisting of 5 extra objects that the colonists can fabricate and interact with, plus a new Rovot tool (not available at launch.

COLONIST - In addition to all of the rewards in the Collector tier, you may immortalize yourself further by becoming one of the UnEarth colonists. By pledging this amount, we'll use your name - or any name you choose - as one of randomly generated names for colonists in the game. (Subject to our approval, basic decency and common sense.)

PLANETARY PIONEER \u2013 On top of all of the rewards in the Collector tier, you may provide one of the randomly generated default names for a newly discovered planet that colonists are doomed to crash upon. (Subject to our approval, basic decency and common sense.)

PSYCHOLOGIST \u2013 By pledging this amount, you receive all the rewards in the Colonist tier, plus you can work with Inkling to design a Colonist Quirk. (Subject to our approval, basic decency and common sense.)

CARICATURE \u2013 With this pledge, you receive all the rewards in the Colonist tier, plus our concept artist Janice Chu will make a custom caricature of you based on a photograph, dressed as one of the UnEarth colonists.

ARCHEOLOGIST -  Interplanetary colonization has been going on for hundreds of years. Players will even sometimes discover the ruins of past colonies. By pledging at this level, you'll not only receive all the rewards in the Colonist tier, but we will also work with you to develop one of your colonies as an archeological site for other players to discover in the final game. (Contents of the colony are subject to our approval, basic decency and common sense.)

ROVOTICS ENGINEER - Rovots are the faithful, mechanical companions of UnEarth colonists. By pledging this amount, you will receive all of the rewards described in the Colonist tier, and we will work with you to design one of the Rovots\u2019 unique tools or weapons. Anything is valid, from Quantum Teleportation, to dispensing soft-serve ICE CREAM. (Final design is subject to our approval, basic decency and common sense.)

XENOBIOLOGIST - The universe is full of life, and at this level, you get to help make some! At this tier, you will receive all the rewards in the Colonist tier, plus we'll work with you to design one of the myriad creatures that inhabit UnEarth's worlds. (Final design is subject to our approval, basic decency and common sense.)

DIRECTOR - By pledging this amount, we'll work with you to develop one of the possible quest-lines that could unfold throughout a game. This could be an invasion by annoying alien neighbors in mobile homes, an insidious creature that invades the minds of your colonists, or an encounter with an alien to other-worldly to comprehend. You get to decide! Oh, and you also get access to all rewards described in the Colonist tier, of course.
